sentences.en: An outgrowth of all these errors is the idea of stabilization.
sentences.cn: 所有这些谬见的总结果是[安定]这个想头.

sentences.en: Corn is an outgrowth on a toe.
sentences.cn: 鸡眼是脚趾上长出的东西.

sentences.en: Enthusiasm it the natural outgrowth of all your efforts toward success.
sentences.cn: 热忱是你为成功所付出所有努力的自然结果.

sentences.en: Inflation is an outgrowth of war.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀是战争带来的后果

sentences.en: Modern mass trANsit is AN outgrowth of industrialization ANd urbANization.
sentences.cn: 现代大众运输是工业化和城市化的产物.

sentences.en: Technology is the outgrowth of science.
The 1977 amendments to the Clean Water Act were an outgrowth of these problems.
sentences.cn: 《洁净水法案》1977年的修正案,是这些问题的派生物.

sentences.en: The deposit outgrowth of tectonic evolution of the Jinning - Chengjing Period.
sentences.cn: 该矿床的形成与晋宁—澄江期构造演化有关.

sentences.en: The eye first appears as a cup-shaped outgrowth from the brain.
sentences.cn: 眼睛开始是从大脑长出，呈杯状。

sentences.en: The manufactureof this material is an outgrowth of the space industry.
sentences.cn: 这种材料的生产是航天工业发展的结果.

sentences.en: The process, as a natural outgrowth of the technology, was called tabbing or setting tabs.
sentences.cn: 这种过程随着技术的自然发展, 称为“制表”.

sentences.en: Their adamantine conservatism is the slow outgrowth of this experience.
sentences.cn: 这种经历缓慢地培育了他们顽固的保守主义.

sentences.en: This big shop is an outgrowth of my little shop I started three years ago.
sentences.cn: 这所大商店是由我三年前开办的那个小店铺发展而成的.

sentences.en: This big store is an outgrowth of the little shop James started ten years ago.
sentences.cn: 这个大商店是吉姆十年前开办的小商店发展的结果.

sentences.en: This project is a combined outgrowth of previous projects.
sentences.cn: (其它项目)联合衍生出的结果?

trans.tran_cn: 自然结果，副产物，生长物
trans.tran_en: something that develops from something else, as a natural result of it
